name: 2dImReg
author: AFNI Developers
description: 2D image registration tool for 3D+time datasets, aligning images on a slice-by-slice basis to a specified base image.

inputs.name: Input file
inputs.description: Filename of input 3d+time dataset to process

inputs.name: Base file
inputs.description: Filename of 3d+time dataset for base image (default = current input dataset)

inputs.name: Base time index
inputs.description: Time index for base image (0 <= num) (default: num = 3)

inputs.name: No fine fit phase flag
inputs.description: Deactivate fine fit phase of image registration (default: fine fit is active)

inputs.name: Fine fit parameters - Blur
inputs.description: FWHM of blurring prior to registration (in pixels) (default: blur = 1.0)

inputs.name: Fine fit parameters - DXY
inputs.description: Convergence tolerance for translations (in pixels) (default: dxy = 0.07)

inputs.name: Fine fit parameters - DPHI
inputs.description: Convergence tolerance for rotations (in degrees) (default: dphi = 0.21)

inputs.name: D-prefix
inputs.description: Write files containing the registration parameters for each slice in chronological order

inputs.name: DMM flag
inputs.description: Change dx and dy output format from pixels to mm

inputs.name: R-prefix
inputs.description: Write files containing the volume RMS error for the original and the registered datasets

inputs.name: Debug flag
inputs.description: Lots of additional output to screen

output-files.name: DX file
output-files.description: File containing dx registration parameters in pixels/mm

output-files.name: DY file
output-files.description: File containing dy registration parameters in pixels/mm

output-files.name: PSI file
output-files.description: File containing psi registration parameters in degrees

output-files.name: Old RMS file
output-files.description: File containing the volume RMS error for the original dataset

output-files.name: New RMS file
output-files.description: File containing the volume RMS error for the registered dataset
